data.text: @Sgrol Hi, let´s check your booking. Please send DM with your full name, booking reference or ticket number and the exact flight date and route. /Keijo
@corbeaux33 Hi, please send DM with your full name, booking reference and the exact flight route. If you have made the booking from a travel agency, please contact them. /Keijo
@karklinse Hi! Please send your booking details (reference, dates and route) via DM so we can check. //Satu
@KayleighToyra Hei, tarkistetaan varauksesi. Lähettäisitkö yksityisviestillä varaustunnuksen tai lippusi numeron sekä varauksellasi olevat sähköpostin ja puhelinnumeron. /Keijo

@MsAlliance Hi, when any of the flights in your booking (for example only the return flight) has been cancelled, you can apply for a refund for all the unused flights on the same ticket. Kindly DM us your booking reference and name like it's on the ticket, we will take a look. //Katja

We’re sorry that we haven’t been able to respond to all messages we’ve received on social media. Did you send us a message on Twitter or Facebook before April? If we haven’t replied to you yet, please get in touch with us again, so we can help you. https://t.co/0ZhOsTNrSk

data.text: RT @vb_karlson: Many colleagues from Finnair have also shared pictures of #finnair airplanes parked at #helsinkiairport due to #coronavirus…
@amankaroliina Kiitos Karoliina idean alkuun laittamisesta ja koordinoinnista 🙏❤️ #InThisTogether

Greetings from team Finnair! We miss our customers, but now is the time to #StayAtHome, show support to healthcare workers, wash hands, look after each other and stay healthy. See you on board again when this difficult time is behind us ✈️ #InThisTogether #feelfinnair @TopiManner https://t.co/NtYhZnuKfL
@cbunthi Hi, if your flight was canceled and the ticket was purchased via Finnair, then you can fill in this refund form: https://t.co/oFFK2Iy3O1 //Mari

@GazelleNE 2/2 Kindly note that if you have booked through and travel agency it is advisable to contact your travel agency for postponing the travel dates or applying refund of cancelled flights.//Hanna-Mari

@GazelleNE 1/2 Hello! Apologies about the delay with our answer. Because of corona virus situation we have queues in all of our service channels.Kindly note that it is not advisable to share booking information publicly.  Kindly dm us about the situation.

data.text:
@gs14081 Hi,

I recommend to check the travel updates and instructions on our website:
https://t.co/cL34kP4L9e

Our social media channel is currently handling a large volume of requests. 
We regret that our response time is longer than usual. 

Thanks for your patience.

-Erkki

data.text: We understand that your travel plans might have changed. That's why we offer you a Finnair Gift Voucher as a refund option. We'll also add 10% on top of the original amount you paid. The voucher is valid for 12 months – but your travel can occur later. https://t.co/0IPgfBxLvD https://t.co/oeOfoI3S8N

@NitinSadana Hi @NitinSadana,
to apply for a refund, you only need to fill this document 
https://t.co/rnFQkDGotv
We'll get back to you as quickly as possible, but unfortunately we do have delays in the refund processing because of high refund application volumes. 
Regards, Sari/Finnair
@AMiddlevillage Hi Amy, I apologize the late reply. If there is anything I could help you with, please send your booking reference and passenger details to us by DM so we can check. //Jukka-Pekka

@0ana411 No reason to worry. It takes time to update all of our systems, but if your flight is cancelled and you've applied for a refund, you're okay. The processing time is currently about 8 weeks. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: A big thank you goes to our Chinese partner @JuneyaoE for delivering masks for our staff. This donation is greatly appreciated and supports the wellbeing of our employees. Xie Xie!

@wkholy1 The current refund processing time is about 8 weeks. You can apply for the refund here: https://t.co/Mn7qG0QS9g We appreciate your patience during this exceptionally difficult time. Heidi / Finnair

Customer service update: If you have a flight within 7 days, please contact us as soon as possible. If your flight departs in more than 7 days, please contact us closer to the departure. The refund processing time is currently about 8 weeks. Thank you for your patience!

data.text: @MariannaKartano Mikäli koronavirustilanne paranisi, olemme valmiita nostamaan kapasiteettia nopeastikin. Valitettavasti tilanteen kehittymistä on tällä hetkellä mahdotonta arvioida. Toivottavasti maailma menee siihen suuntaan, että pääset kesällä Suomeen! Heidi / Finnair

@MyLilKookKook Hello! Apologies about the delay with our answer. Because of corona virus situation we have queues in all of our service channels. Contact information in reservation can be updated through manage my booking or through our customer service//Hanna-Mari

data.text: @laihopentti456 Kotoutuslentoja on järjestetty eri kohteista. Ne ovat sivuillamme myynnissä normaalisti. Mikäli tarvitset lisätietoja tai kyse on sinun varauksestasi, kerrotko yksityisviestillä varaustunnuksen sekä sähköpostiosoitteesi niin tarkistetaan? Katso myös https://t.co/xuuH0lYrsb / Elli

@Onnetar Sorry for the late reply. If you still need assistance with this, please DM us the booking reference, travel dates, names of the passengers and e-mail address on the booking for identification. /Elli

@equali_twear Hi!

BKK flights will be cancelled 1st and 2nd of April.
From here you can find updated info and canceled flights: https://t.co/mOzWCQe8b7

/Jukka-Pekka

Oh so quiet! @MikaLukkinen took these gorgeous photos of our beautiful aircraft parked at our Hel Hub. We can’t wait to see these birds up in the air again. They’re now getting some maintenance so they’ll be nice and ready to fly you when better times arrive. May that be soon! https://t.co/zd3OVgjWkJ
@JustySmile Hi, please see this FAQ on cancellations and guidance on what to do: https://t.co/G9wBHVOUB8 Heidi / Finnair
@manchin71116881 Hi! I apologize the late reply. In urgent cases it is recommended to contact by phone or via online chat. //Jukka-Pekka
We've extended the validity period for Finnair gift vouchers that expire between 1 March and 1 September. You can now use them until 30 September 2020.
@h13864312 @FinnairHelps @Travelport I'm sorry for the delay in getting back to you. Unfortunately we have a massive backlog at the moment. Regards, Heidi / Finnair
@h13864312 @FinnairHelps @Travelport Hi, if you've booked your ticket from Travelport, you need to contact them for the refund. Regards, Heidi / Finnair
@Riinamaya Hi Riina, you can see our traffic plan for April - June 2020 from here https://t.co/Sjbgx5vnHZ  //Roosa

@stulevy Hi! Sorry for my late reply. Have you already been able to change your ticket? If not then please send us your booking reference, route and dates via DM. If you have booked via travel agency/online travel agency, please contact them directly. //Satu

-Auli

@amarbiseswar Hi, any Finnish people wishing to travel to Finland should make sure they've given a travel notification to the Foreign Ministry of Finland: https://t.co/iqMdhtKMpq The Foreign Ministry is coordinating the situation for Finns who are currently abroad. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: During this exceptional time, we have been trying to find solutions with our cargo customers in order to continue operations. We are happy to announce that today we have our first commercial cargo only flight operating from Helsinki to Seoul and back. https://t.co/Ko4YSmfz4t
@chaudcacao59 Hi, I am very sorry for the late reply. The Tokyo-Helsinki route is cancelled as of 27 March. Please see your options from here: https://t.co/zmU1DjS7x2 /Krista from Finnair

@Helmuli Hei Helmi, pyytäisin sinua laittamaan varaustunnuksen sekä lentotiedot, sekä matkustajien nimet yksityisviestinä, niin tarkistamme tilanteen. Ruuhkautuneen palvelun vuoksi vastausviivettä on nyt jonkin verran, mutta vastaamme sinulle mahdollisimman pian. //Katja

@aikkauk Hi Alena! Apologies about the delay with our answer. Because of corona virus situation we have queues in all of our service channels. Qualifying periods are extended automatically by the end of this month. Kindly dm your account number if you wish us to take a look//Hanna-Mari

data.text: @james_WTF Hi! Yes, unfortunately we wont be operating on these routes until July, according the information we have at the moment. If you have reservation for our flights, you can postpone until 30.11.2020 or you can request refund. Please find more info here: https://t.co/78QniYxucf //Anu

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @MMaevskii Hi, yes, unfortunately. You can see the full list of cancelled flights from here: https://t.co/fXqN9zrMNF /Krista from Finnair
@adrillaneza Hi, yes we do. You can find our online form for refund from here: https://t.co/rnFQkDGotv /Krista from Finnair
@britttttens Hi! Please notice I answered to your DM. //Anu

We make announcements in our planes for people arriving in Finland and tell them about the required 14-day quarantine. We also share written guidance on how they can protect themselves and others from coronavirus. Read more: https://t.co/SXJElt8VHt

data.text: @BFSfunding Hi, did you book through Finnair, or a 3rd party/travel agency? Heidi / Finnair

@BFSfunding Hi David, unfortunately we have a very large amount of refunds to process due to the exceptional situation. That is causing some backlog. We are working very hard to process all refunds, including yours. Thank you for your patience in this difficult time. Heidi / Finnair

Regards,
Elli

@Krummus Hi Ashley, my apologies for the delayed reply. Kindly DM your booking reference and flight details to us, if this is not already solved in other channels. If the flight is close, please call or contact us via chat, if possible. //Katja

data.text: We will fly a repatriation flight from Havana organised together with the Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland to bring home Finnish people who are currently in Cuba. AY028 leaves on March 31 at 00:45 local time. Tickets are now on sale on our website. https://t.co/wLlLjsH4sn

urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text: @BirtChristopher Hi Christopher, my apologies for the long wait. I'm glad to see that you've already had help with the booking, refund handling takes around 4-5 weeks at the moment. //Katja
@JoyAgnost Hi Sanjoy, I have just replied to your DM, I'm sorry for the long wait. //Katja

@Robosmit Hi, my apologies for the long wait. I'm afraid all service channels are very congested at the moment and it means some delay with the replies as well. Refund handling takes around 4-5 weeks, and the refund form is indeed the fastest way to forward the request to Finnair. //Katja
@rimpinen_hannu Hei Hannu, pahoittelen vastausviivettä. Vastasin juuri yksityisviestiisi asiaan liittyen. //Katja

If your flight with us has not been cancelled yet, you might be able to postpone the existing booking by yourself on Manage Booking page. Watch this video to see if you can postpone your travel without contacting our customer service. https://t.co/fpPNeHvNR7
@JoTikkanen Hei Jorma, voit hakea korvausta meiltä lipun hinnasta. Tästä on tulossa tänään lisätietoa. Takaisinmaksulomake löytyy täältä: https://t.co/VnqI8SUcSj Terkuin, Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Takaisinmaksu
urls.description: Tällä lomakkeella voit hakea takaisinmaksua käyttämättömästä lipusta tai lento-osuudesta, tai maksullisesta lisäpalvelusta kuten istuinpaikasta tai ateriasta.

data.text: @VivienneChow Hi! I am sorry for the delayed answer. You can postpone flights free of charge up to 25JUN20 (last return date), if the flights operate. Other option is to refund the unused part of your ticket. Kindly call our Customer Service before original dep. date for change/refund. /Auli

@ShaunaCulloty Hi, our customer service is unfortunately still very congested, so the waiting times can be quite long. Did you try to get hold of them via chat? https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy Heidi / Finnair
@JonathanFinch12 Hi, please see this FAQ for information on what to do: https://t.co/G9wBHVOUB8 Regards, Heidi / Finnair
@erwin74w Hi, this doesn't affect transfer passengers, only people living in Finland. Please see Finavia's website for airport information: https://t.co/OFnzJoUhS8 Regards, Heidi / Finnair

@sweta_iyer Hi, normally the refund processing takes about a month, but as we've now cancelled thousands of flights there's some backlog and it might take longer than usual. I'm sorry about this, thank you for your patience! Heidi / Finnair

@xplin Hi,

Thank you for contacting us.

I noticed that refund is already requested.

Our customer service is currently handling a large volume of requests. 
We regret that our response time is longer than usual. 

-Erkki

urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. data.text: @senthilr2811 Hi, we have been forced to cut down our capacity a lot, and the Delhi flights are ones of the cancelled ones for now. Please see the current list of cancelled flights here https://t.co/t6XU2rdPk2 and let us know if we can help you with anything else. /Elli

@finlaywalker11 Hi, please see our FAQ on this topic and what to do when your flight is cancelled: https://t.co/G9wBHVOUB8
Heidi / Finnair
@Windvern Hi! Please notice I answered to your DM. //Anu
@Demone63253604 Hi, please read this FAQ for advice on what to do: https://t.co/G9wBHVOUB8 Regards, Heidi / Finnair
@matty765RS Hi, you can apply for a refund here: https://t.co/Mn7qG0QS9g Regards, Heidi / Finnair

@danielschgunner Hi there, sorry for the inconvenience. All our lines have been quite congested lately. If you still need assistance, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look. /Elli
@ThomasKneale Hi Thomas, if you still need assistance with this, please DM us your booking reference, e-mail address on the booking and the old and new travel dates so we can have a look. / Elli
@AnnaOnTheRock Hi, please read this FAQ for information on what to do: https://t.co/G9wBHVOUB8 Regards, Heidi / Finnair

@conchoecia Hi! We are sorry about the cancelled flights and delayed answer in this channel. If the matter is not handled yet and it is urgent, please contact us in real-time either through our website's chat or by calling us, tel +358 9 818 0800 (24h). /Saara

@raunaqp Hi!If you have booked your tickets through a Travel Agency, please contact them in case of flight changes/refunds. In case you have booked tickets directly from Finnair, please make a phone call to our customer service, unfortunately this channel is congested at the moment /Saara
@JussiPekkaRode Kiitos, kiva kuulla, että sait asiat hoidettua! Tervetuloa takaisin kyytiin parempina aikoina! Heidi / Finnair

The outbreak of coronavirus has lead to thousands of cancellations and changes to our flights. We do everything we can to help you but we regret that our response times are currently longer than usual. Watch the video for instructions on what to do if your travel is affected. https://t.co/YkyneU0lCu
